spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but Bed-1's window/door relationship to its deck is altered. The foyer area is slightly oversimplified compared to the 2D offset.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is somewhat inconsistent. The utility area orientation and connection to the kitchen show minor structural deviations. Bed-1 door placement is slightly shifted.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly accurate to the plan, including the dining round table, living sofa set, and bed orientations.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting and shadows provide good depth. Modeling is clean with clear room delineation.

detected_errors.description: Bed-1 entrance door shifted closer to the center of the wall compared to the plan's corner placement.
Utility room's interior partitioning wall is poorly defined compared to the 2D technical layout.
Foyer area width appears slightly wider in proportion to the adjacent kitchen wall than specified in the 2D dimensions.
